name: conversations_list
description: Lists all channels in a Slack team.

exclude_archived.description: Set to `true` to exclude archived channels from the list

types.description: Mix and match channel types by providing a comma-separated list of any combination of `public_channel`, `private_channel`, `mpim`, `im`

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return. Fewer than the requested number of items may be returned, even if the end of the list hasn't been reached. Must be an integer no larger than 1000.

cursor.description: Paginate through collections of data by setting the `cursor` parameter to a `next_cursor` attribute returned by a previous request's `response_metadata`. Default value fetches the first "page" of the collection. See [pagination](/docs/pagination) for more detail.

$block: Schema for successful response from conversations.list method
Schema for error response from conversations.list method
